body:
It's almost been 5 months as staff, so I thought I would do an AMA 

Ask away :)
body_tagged:
It's almost been 5 months as staff, so I thought I would do an AMA 

Ask away :)
title: AMA - 5 Months as staff

replies.body:

replies.body:
I doubt it'll be much different from your last AMA, but I'll follow the age-old tradition of asking for your opinion.

Also, in general, what are your Avicus-related plans? Where do you think you're going to go from the point where you currently are?
replies.body_tagged:
I doubt it'll be much different from your last AMA, but I'll follow the age-old tradition of asking for your opinion.

Also, in general, what are your Avicus-related plans? Where do you think you're going to go from the point where you currently are?

Yeah I was getting desperate

Hmmm this is a hard one the Boeing 787 is pretty cool, I fly that often

You seem really enthusiastic about moderating which is good, you have potential. Don't be afraid to ask questions. Also don't forget to ask before you do things.

replies.body:
Tradition is a key factor in a strong community :)

Anyway I thought you were a bit egotistical at first but now I see that you really care about the community. 

I want to do my best to rehabilitate the competitive scene. Currently there a only 4-5 active competitive teams, and there need to be more. My goal as a builder is to build a map that gets played in the tourney and is of high quality.
replies.body_tagged:
Tradition is a key factor in a strong community :)

Anyway I thought you were a bit egotistical at first but now I see that you really care about the community. 

I want to do my best to rehabilitate the competitive scene. Currently there a only 4-5 active competitive teams, and there need to be more. My goal as a builder is to build a map that gets played in the tourney and is of high quality.

replies.body:
I'll never forget when you SS me about a year ago xd. That was a cringe fest... Anyway we used to hate each other a while ago but now we are pretty close friends. You are a really skilled builder and you have great potential as a staff member :)

Yes, I would love to organize tournaments and do my best to grow the Avicus competitive scene.

I'll never forget when you SS me about a year ago xd. That was a cringe fest... Anyway we used to hate each other a while ago but now we are pretty close friends. You are a really skilled builder and you have great potential as a staff member :)

Yes, I would love to organize tournaments and do my best to grow the Avicus competitive scene.
